lead_paragraph: The Man Group, the world's largest publicly traded hedge fund manager, is for the first time accepting individual investors in Singapore for a fund that uses computer programs to identify trades in futures markets, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: Man Group, the world's largest publicly traded hedge-fund manager, is for the first time marketing to individual investors in Singapore a fund which uses computer programs to identify trades in futures markets, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Man Group Opens Fund to Singapore Investors

abstract: Man Group, the world's largest publicly traded hedge-fund manager, is for the first time marketing to individual investors in Singapore a fund which uses computer programs to identify trades in futures markets, Bloomberg News reported.
